item.title: Arizona Inauguration Protest
item.description: Today I stood with hundreds of Arizonans to protest the inaugaration of "45". I can't say his name. I spoke on Â behalf of Democracy for America-Maricopa County. We will be organizing to elect progressive candidates to the Az. Legislature, City Council, and school boards. We will work to find a new Governor and Senator. But, we need your help. Join us at our monthly meet-ups on the 3rd Wed. of each month. We meet at Coco's Restaurant @ 2026 N 7th St. Meet, greet and order from the menu begins at 6 pm. Meeting starts at 6:30 pm. For more information contact Toby using the Contact link on this site.
item.author: tstahl

item.title: Rachel Maddow Interview with Chuck Shumer
item.description:
Schumer said we will stop any bill we are opposed to and support any bill that meets the needs of the people.

See it here
item.author: tstahl
